// Standard YAML's Failsafe schema. // www.yaml.org/spec/1.2/spec.html#id2802346

'use strict';

var Schema = require('../schema');

module.exports = new Schema({

explicit: [
  require('../type/str'),
  require('../type/seq'),
  require('../type/map')
]

});
